property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect: Assign to a target battle participant. Target gains +X resistance. X equals the target's battle rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect: Assign to a target battle participant. Target gains +X resistance. X equals the target's battle rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Name a target deployed or subdued persona governed by a rival. If deployed, subdue the target unless its governor pays you X solaris. If subdued, discard the target unless its governor pays you X solaris. X equals the target's command.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage your homeworld to increase your declared favor by X. X equals twice the number of solaris produced by your homeworld.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Reduce your favor by X to discard up to X cards from the top of a target rival's house deck. X may not exceed the intrigue rank of the assigned persona.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona you govern. When the assigned persona leads an arbitration rite, you may declare a Dune fief as the target of the rite.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to your lead participand. Add +X to the target's arbitration rank. X may not exceed the target's arbitration rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Subdue Patriarch and discard 1 favor to engage or disengage Arrakeen.

property.name: AutoScript
property.value: CSF1:EngageTarget-Targeted-on{Arrakeen, Capital of Arrakis}||CSF1:DisengageTarget-Targeted-on{Arrakeen, Capital of Arrakis}

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to request payment of 3 solaris from the current governor of Arrakeen. If the player refuses to pay or cannot pay, increase your favor by 3. If you govern Arrakeen, you may either produce 3 solaris in your treasury or increase your favor by 3.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 2 solaris in your treasury, or engage to assign 3 deferment tokens to any target subdued Dune fief you govern except Dune.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target leader. Duration Effect. The target generates +X force. X equals the target's resistance. The target is considered vanquished regardless of the amount of force it is assigned.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Produce 1 solari in your treasury each time a rival initiates a petition to deploy a holding.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target city or homeworld. Atreides House Guard does not count against the target's command limit. Battle Tactic (engagement). If target participates in a battle rite, engage to include as a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: If Dune is not currently deployed, subdue your homeworld to deploy Dune free of cost. Transfer assigned cards from your homeworld to Dune normally.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Declaration Tactic. Engage to discard a target intrigue venture.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to your lead participant. Add +X to the target's dueling rank. X may not exceed target's dueling rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to deploy a target subdued Dune event you govern. The target must be assigned the required deferment tokens to be deployed, but deploying it does not count against your House Interval limit.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 2 solaris in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to the target of the Petition. If the target fails to be deployed, transfer it immediately to its owner's Imperial deck. Shuffle the deck upon completion.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to request payment of 3 solaris from the current governor of Carthag. If the player refuses to pay or cannot pay, increase your favor by 3. If you govern Carthag, you may either produce 3 solaris in your treasury or increase your favor by 3.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Subdue Privateer and discard 1 favor to disengage Carthag.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Discard X cards from your hand and replace them by drawing X+1 cards from the top of your house deck.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to the target on the Petition. If you are the victor, each rival who increased the bid during the petition must reduce their favor by 1.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Arbitration Tactic (engagement). Engage to reduce the arbitration rank or resistance of a target participant by X for the remainder of the rite. X equals Cesar's command.

property.name: Operation
property.value: The governor of Dune must subdue Dune and deploy their homeworld without cost, even if it has no deferment tokens. Transfer all assigned cards from Dune to the homeworld retaining their current status.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to transfer 1 spice assigned to a desert you govern to the Guid Hoard, producing X solaris in your treasury. X equals CROE-1. Reset the CROE after transfering the spice.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Transfer a target decree from your assembly, assigning it to an eligible target you govern. Assign the decree in the subdued position.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Apply X force to a target transport governed by a rival, X equals the battle or intrigue rank of the assigned persona. If applied force equals or exceeds the target;s resistance, capture the target. If you do not possess an eligible target for assigning the transport, discard it instead.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. When initiating any rite except duels, the target gains Direct.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Discard X favor to reduce the deployment cost of all aides and/or personnel you deploy by X solaris. You may reduce the deployment cost of subdued targets as well as those being deployed from your hand. Only 0 cost subdued cards may be deployed without being assigned at least one deferment token.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce X solaris in your treasury. X equals the number of Spice Harvesters, Carryalls and Harvester Pads deployed by a target player.

property.name: AutoScript
property.value: CE:Gain1Solaris-per{Spice Harvester, Spice Mining Factory}_or_{Carryall, Harvester Transport}_or_{Harvester Pad, Spice Mining Base}-byTarget

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Subdued personas must be assigned a number of deferment tokens equal to their deployment cost to be deployed as a general operation.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. Engage the assigned persona to apply X force to a target non-shield bastion. If the applied force exceeds the bastion's deployment cost, discard the bastion. X equals the assigned persona's battle rank +1 per assigned troop.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Battle Tactic (engagement). Capture or discard all equipment assigned to a target participant vanquished during a battle rite led by Desert Hawk. If Desert Hawk and/or its assigned personnel are eligible, assign the equipment to them. If ineligible, discard the equipment.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage the target to immediately end the rite. Produce X solaris in the attacking player's treasury. X equals the target's command. The rite counts against the attacker's interval limit.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to a target duel participant. Target gains +X resistance. X equals the target's dueling rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Transfer X target equipment resources from an assigned target you govern to a new, eligible target you govern. The equipment retains its current status when transferred.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or fief. Dune Men gain +1 battle rank when assigned to the same fief as a Spice Harvester or Harvesting Pad. Battle Tactic (engagement). If target participates in a battle rite, engage to include as participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Subdue up to X equipment cards assigned to a target desert and/or assigned to any cards assigned to that target desert.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 3. Assign to a target persona governed by a rival. Reduce the target's resistance by 1. If the target's resistance is reduced to 0, discard the target.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target Reverend Mother. Declaratio Tactic (Intrigue or Duel). Engage the assigned Reverend Mother to declare a new target for the rite. The new target must be governed by the same player and is treated as the original target of the rite.

property.name: Operation
property.value: When Jago leads a dueling rite, add +X to the ammount of favor gained or lost if the opposing leader is vanquished. X equals the leader's dueling rank.

card.name: Esmar Tuek, Naib of Sietch Tuek

property.name: Operation
property.value: Declaration Tactic. Engage Tuek and discard up to X cards from your hand to draw X cards from the top of your House deck. X equals Tuek's command.

card.name: Eyes of Ibad, Blue within blue

property.name: Operation
property.value: Discard a target subdued event and its assigned deferment tokens. X equals its number of assigned deferment tokens.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Fakhir may Counter during arbitration and battle rites having a Dune fief or Dune charter oas the declared target. Countering does not engage Fakhir, nor does it require him to be disengaged.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 3 solaris in your treasury, or engage to transfer one of the top 5 cards from your House discard to your House deck, shuffling the deck upon completion. When deploying Dune do not subdue False Wall South.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage Treazal and discard a target resource from your hand to produce X solaris in your treasury. X equals the deployment cost of the target resource.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. No spice may be produced or transferred as the result of engaging cards or deploying events.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Reduce your favor by X to transfer X cards from the top of your Imperial discard to your Imperial Deck. Reshuffle your Imperial deck after transferring all cards, X may not exceed 5.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Free Trader Scout generates +X force during battle and intrigue rites. X equals the number of Smuggler troops or cohorts assigned to Free Trader Scout.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target Dune fief you govern. Fremen Sietch Reserves do not count against the target's command limit. Battle Tactic (engagement). If target participates in a battle rite, engage to include as a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Sort through your House deck and draw any one equipment card into your hand, Shuffle your House deck upon completion.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce X solaris in your treasury. X equals the number of personnel assigned to a target Dune fief.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to the Northern Polar Sink. Northern Polar Sink gains +1 command and +1 resistance. When engaging the Northern Polar Sink to produce solaris, produce 1 additional solari per deployed Glacier Refinery assigned to it.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target noble you govern. Discard Governor of Arrakis if Dune is deployed by a rival. Battle Tactic (engagement). Engage the assigned noble to capture a Dune fief vanquished during a rite you initiate.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to your homeworld. Assign initiative rankings from lowest to highest declared favor, with the lowest favor earning rank 1, the second lowest winning rank 2, and so on. Break any ties as usual.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target delegate you govern. Arbitration Tactic (engagement). Engage the assigned delegate and pay X solaris to capture a target Dune charter vanquished during an arbitration rite you initiate. X equals the deployment cost of the target charter.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target vassal or aide. The target gains Guild allegiance and the subtype "delegate". Engage the assigned persona to subdue a target compact.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target fief. Engage to deploy a target aide or personnel from your hand without having to play its deployment cost.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Guild Spokesman gains Direct when leading arbitration rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona. Intrigue Tactic (engagement). If target participates in an intrigue rite, engage to include as a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 1 spice in the Guild Hoard and reset the CROE. Hagga Basin is immune to force generated by Sandworm and Coriolis Storm events.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Place and deploy Sleeper like an event, but do not discard its assigned deferment tokens upon eployment. Sleeper gains +1 intrigue rank per assigned deferment token, but if it becomes subdued discard all of its assigned deferment tokens. Sleeper must be deployed once it has been assigned 5 deferment tokens.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or fief. Sleeper Troop gains Surprise when participating in battle rites. Battle Tactic (engagement). If target participates in a battle rite, engage to include as a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to the Shield Wall or a target desert. The target gains +1 command. Subdue to disengage all Spice Harvesters and Carryalls assigned to the same fief as Harvester Pad.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Desert fiefs may be targeted during arbitration rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Declaration Tactic. Engage to subdue a target deployed Dune event.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target non-homeworld fief governed by a rival. Each time the target is engaged by its governor to produce solaris or spice, produce X solaris in your treasury. X equals the target's command.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target ally. The assigned ally may not be declared the target of an intrigue rite.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 3. Assign to a target fief you govern. The target gains +1 command, and +2 battle rank. The target also gains +2 resistance during battle rites. Declaration Tactic. Engage to transfer House Frigate to a target fief you govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target desert you govern. Engage the target to transfer 1 of its assigned spice to your house hoard. The target gains the same allegiance as your homeworld.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or fief. If assigned to a fief, the fief generates +X force per Ice Rigger troop assigned. Battle Tactic (engagement). If target participates in a battle rite, engage to include as a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or charter. Arbitration Tactic (engagement). If target participates in an arbitration rite, engage to include as a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target vassal or aide. The target gains Corrino allegiance and the subtype "delegate". Engage the assigned persona to subdue a target title, compact, or sanction.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Discard a target battle venture or tactic.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Discard a target intrigue venture or tactic.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Valdeshar gains Surprise when leading intrigue rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target directorship. When engaged to produce solaris, target produces +2 solaris. The directorship may not be targeted during arbitration rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target vassal you govern. Engage the assigned target and discard Judge of the Change to immediately subdue Dune.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. The target gains +2 arbitration rank. Target also gains +1 resistance during arbitration rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Ignore all effects generated by Counter operations and tactic when Kaldo leads an intrigue rite.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target ally. The assigned ally may not be declared the target of a dueling rite.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 2 solaris in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. The target gains +2 Intrigue rank. Target also gains +1 resistance during intrigue rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Initiative Tactic (declaration). Pay X solaris to increase your declared favor by X. X may not exceed 'Lida's intrigue rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Bewt can lead arbitration rites targeting city fiefs. Tactic, Arbitration (declaration). Bewt gains Surprise when leading arbitration rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Declaration Tactic. Engage Aneirin and a target Spice Harvester you govern to transfer 1 spice assigned to any desert to your hoard. You must pay 1 solari to the desert's governor in order to complete the transfer.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target heir. The target gains +1 prescience rank, and immunity to capture effects. Tactic (declaration). If assigned heir is declared the target of a rite, you may engage any Fremen persona to Counter.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to a target arbitration participant. Target gains +X resistance. X equals the target's arbitration rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Transfer a target card from a rival's assembly to their Imperial deck. The rival must immediately reshuffle the deck.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Discard a random target card from a rival's assembly.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Coss may Counter during battle and arbitration rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Discard a target prescience venture or tactic.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Deploy a target subdued event you govern. An event must be assigned the necessary number of deferment tokens in order to be targeted by this tactic. X equals the number of deferment tokens assigned to the target.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 2. Assign to a target persona. If the target is an Aide, its subtype changes from "Aide" to "Ally". If the target is an ally, it gains the subtype "Noble".

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 3 + X solaris in your treasury. X equals the number of Dune cities deployed by all players. When deploying Dune, do not subdue Northern Polar Sink.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Omri can lead arbitration rites targeting desert fiefs. Tactic, Arbitration (declaration). Omri gains Direct when leading arbitration rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Ignore all effects generated by Counter operations and tactics when Otheym leads a battle rite.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Padishah Lapdog gains Surprise when leading arbitration rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Intrigue rites led by Pardee do not count against your House Interval limit.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Draw up to X cards from the top of your House deck into your hand. X equals the assigned persona's weirding rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Each player may engage any of their Fremen personas having battle talent to produce X solaris in their treasury. X equals the total battle rank of all personas so engaged.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to the target of the Petition. If the target is successfully deployed, the Petitioner may immediately draw 1 card from their Imperial deck and place it face down in their assembly.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. If you lose a petition you initiate, you may discard the target of the petition to discard a target card from the victor's assembly. You may not examine the victor's cards before naming a target. If the discarded cards are of different types, you must reduce your favor by 1.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Deploy a target subdued persona. X equals the target's deployment cost less the number of deferment tokens assigned to it.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 3 solaris in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. The target gains +1 weirding rank and +1 resistance.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Discard a target weirding venture or tactic.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. The target gains +2 dueling rank. Target also gains +1 resistance during dueling rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Transfer a target Spice Blow event from your house discard to the top of your house deck.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Transfer a target subdued decree to its owner's assembly.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target Charter. The target gains +1 resistance per assigned union or legation.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Proctor of Spies gains Direct when leaing intrigue rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage all deserts to produce X spice in the Guild Hoar. X equals 1 spice per desert so engaged.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to a target deplyed duration effect event. At the end of the turn discard Protracted Duration instead of discarding the assigned event.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to a target intrigue participant. Target gains +X resistance. X equals the target's intrigue rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 2 solaris in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Initiative Tactic (declaration). Engage to add +X to your declared favor. X equals the number of Pyon Labor Force personnel you govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target fief you govern. If subdued, the target gains +1 deferment token per assigned Pyon Labor Force during the deferment phase. Battle Tactic (engagement). If target participates in a battle rite, engage to include as a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 3. Assign to a target fief you govern. The target gains +1 resistance. When engaging the target to produce solaris or spice, produce 1 additional solari in your treasury per Pyon Village assigned to it.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target physician. Target physician is ineligible to participate in any rites. Engage assigned physician to discard a target Condition enhancement.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to Dune. You may deploy your homeworld as if Dune were subdued. When deploying your homeworld, do not transfer cards from Dune to your original homeworld.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona not currently assigned a blade. Target generates +2 force during dueling rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Transfer up to X spice assigned to a target desert governed by a rival to your hoard. X equals the number of troops assigned to the persona initiating Razzia.

property.name: Operation
property.value: When Remy initiates a rite that succeeds in vanquishing its target, you may choose to gain or discard favor or solaris regardless of the type of rite initiated.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Discard a target dueling venture or tactic.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to capture a target Spice Harvester assigned to a subdued Dune fief. If the target Harvester is assigned any cards, they remain assigned when the Harvester is captured. All captured cards retain their current status when transferred.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to your leader. Duration Effect. Reduce the dueling rank or resistance of the opposing leader by X. X equals your leader's dueling rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 2 solaris in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona governed by a rival. Reduce the target's command by 1. The target's command may not be reduced below 0.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Upon deployment, name a target charter governed by a rival. Shadow Partnership gains the same operation as the named charter, functioning in the same manner.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 2 solaris in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 2 solaris per desert you govern in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Discard X cards from your assembly and replace them by drawing X cards from your Imperial deck.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to a target homeworld. If the target is vanquished during the battle, its governor must discard 1 spice.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage Siridar Governorship and discard up to 3 favor to produce X solaris in your treasury. X equals 2 solaris per favor discarded.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to increase your favor by 2.

card.name: Sister Baruna, Proctor of the Panoplia

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to apply X force to a target native persona. If the target's resistance is reduced to 0 by applied force, subdue the target. X equals Baruna's weirding rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target smuggler persona. Intrigue Tactic (engagement). If target participates in an intrigue rite, engage to include as a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or fief. Battle Tactic (engagement). If target participates in a battle rite, engage to include as a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 3. Assign to a target Smuggler fief. Engage to place a target aide, equipment or personnel from your hand into your domain, in the subdued position. You may assign a resource to a subdued target when placing it if the target is otherwise eligible for its assignment.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target ally. The target gains +X command. X equals the number of Smuggler allies you govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Declaration Tactic. Engage to produce X solaris in your treasury. X equals the deployment cost of a target House card deployed by a rival.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or charter. Arbitration Tactic (engagement). If the target participates in an arbitration rite, engage to include as a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona. Engage the persona to apply X force to a target subdued aide having the intrigue talent. If the applied force exceeds the aide's resistance, discard the aide. X equals the assigned persona's battle rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engagement Tactic. Engage to add +2 to the resistance of a target Dune charter you govern.

card.name: Spice Dogs, Spice Mining Union Reps

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or charter. Arbitration Tactic (engagement). If the target participates in an arbitration rite, engage to include as a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to disengage a target Spice Harvester you govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to target persona. The target gains +X prescience rank. X may not exceed 3. Subdue Spice Infusion during your next house discard phase. When Spice Infusion is redeployed, its deployment cost may vary but it must remain assigned to the same target.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage an ally you govern to produce X solaris in your treasury. The ally must bear allegiance to your chosen sponson. X equals the target's command.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Produce 1 spice and assign it to a target desert.

property.name: Operation
property.value: If a desert is vanquished during a battle rite led by Staban, transfer up to X spice assigned to the desert to your hoard. X equals the number of participating troops assigned to Staban.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona or troop. If your homeworld is a Dune fief, you may assign 1 additional deferment token to the target each deferment phase.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to your lead participant. Add +X to the target's intrigue rank. X equals the targe's intrigue rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Assign to a target battle participant. The target gains +X battle rank. X may not exceed the target's battle rank + command.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or charter. The assigned target gains +1 arbitration rank per assigned Strategy Delegation. Arbitration Tactic (engagement). If target participates in an arbitration rite, engage to include as a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Reduce your declared favor by as much as X to produce X solaris in your treasury. X equals the number of Allies your govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 2 spice assigning it to the Great Flat, or engage to produce 2 spice in the Guild Hoard. If produced in the Guild Hoard, reset the CROE.

card.name: The Shield Wall, Great Barrier Range

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 3 solaris in your treasury, or engage and pay X solaris to disengage a target desert you govern. X equals the number of spice produced by the target. When deploying Dune, do not subdue the Shield Wall.

property.name: AutoScript
property.value: CE:Gain3Solaris||CE:UseCustomAbility{The Shield Wall, Great Barrier Range}-Targeted-onDesert

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target fief. When engaging the target to produce solaris, you may reduce the number of solaris produced by X to increase your favor by X.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Subdue to disengage a target desert you govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to deploy a resource card from your hand at 0 deployment cost.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. Battle Tactic (engagement). Engage to allow the target and any of its assigned troops to be engaged as additional defense participants in a battle rite targeting a fief you govern.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Target any two subdued events and switch their assigned deferment tokens. X equals the greater number of deferment tokens assigned to either of the events.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target native. Assign 1 additional deferment token to the target each deferment phase.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1.Assign to a target persona. Engage the assigned persona and pay X to deploy a target subdued Imperial event you govern. X equals the number of additional deferment tokens required to deploy the event. Deploying the event does not count against your House Interval limit.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Discard a target arbitration venture or tactic.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target desert. The target gains Fremen allegiance. You may assign Fremen personnel to the target from your hand without paying their deployment cost. Personnel so assigned must be placed in the subdued position.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. The target gains +2 battle rank. The target also gains +1 resistance during battle rites.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or fief. Vanguard Battalion gains Surprise during battle rites. Battle Tactic (engagement). If target participates in a battle rite, engage to include as a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Deploy a target subdued event you govern. Deploying the event does not count against your House Interval limit. X equals the event's deployment cost less the number of deferment tokens currently assigned to it.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target persona. Voice Effect. Engage assigned persona to apply X force to a target aide or vassal, If applied force exceeds the target's command, subdue the target. X equals the assigned persona's weirding rank.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Limit 1. Assign to a target physician. When engaging the physician to assign deferment tokens to a subdued persona, assign 2 additional deferment tokens.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Duration Effect. Name a target rival. You and the target rival must discard all participants vanquished during intrigue rites either of you initiate.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target ally. During petitions targeting Dune fiefs, you may increase the bid as if you had five additional solaris in your treasury. If you are the victor and cannot pay the final deployment cost, you may subdue the assigned noble instead of reducing your favor.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to increase your favor by X. X equals the Water Marshal's command.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to transfer up to X solaris from a target rival's treasury to your own treasury. X equals the Water Peddler's command.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage up to X target Dune fiefs except deserts.

card.name: Water Tribute, Custom of the Fai

property.name: Operation
property.value: Pay 2X solaris to increase your favor by X. X may not exceed 3.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Assign to a target persona or charter. Arbitration Tactic (engagement). If target participates in an arbitration rite, engage to include as a participant.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Engage to produce 2 solaris in your treasury.

property.name: Operation
property.value: Discard a target subdued Sandworm event you govern to produce X solaris in your treasury. X equals the number of deferment tokens assigned to the event.

card.name: Zenzi Bewt, Niece of Lingar Bewt

property.name: Operation
property.value: Declaration Tactic. Engage to engage target ally.
